--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Megan, or Yan, or whoever has control over Iron Raptor right 
now, please respond to Quatro's request to form an alliance.  I'll 
copy and paste the exact message again.
> 
> Quatro opened a special communications link with Iron Raptor.(He 
doesn't need no special wrist device or anything, he has a special 
device planted inside of him, so he can talk like normal except over 
long distances and when he is engaged in a long distance conversation 
his eyes glow blue instead of green) 
> 
>            "Iron Raptor, leader of the Maximals, I am universal 
bounty hunter Quatro, and I came to Earth to kill Hell Beast and 
Megatron.  I was thinking that I could side with you for a while, and 
we may be able to help eachother," Quatro said.
